name: The Legend of John Stone
description:
The Legend of John Stone

Left Click to Attack

WASD to Move
Space to Jump

John's Story:
The adventure begins with our hero, John Stone, who faces an unexpected discussion with his old king about the village that he knows and loves... but what? Is the village amulet safe?

Download and find out now the story of John Stone.

My story:

Hello, you. I am a very rusty game developer who decided to revisit the old days of game dev after years of full-time web development. I joined this game jam just for fun, but unfortunately, I underestimated my free time so instead of a week I only had ~24 hours to work on this, around 3-4 hours a day, because I only found out about the game jam on Monday.


Resources:
The background images are from unsplash.com, I used the standard unity assets for the characters' basic movements and the characters are from the unity assets store. The music is copyright free.

I will come back and properly update the list of credits in a few days. Maybe, who knows, to improve the game too, if you wanna see updates?

P.S. Check out the game I am working on now: https://zascal.itch.io/we-build-cities Any feedback is appreciated
